title: Rodney Strong Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, August 27, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a special evening featuring the acclaimed wines of Rodney Strong Vineyards. Known for their dedication to Sonoma terroir, Rodney Strong crafts elegant, expressive wines that highlight some of the region’s finest appellations.

Tasting Fee: $30 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

With Special Guest:

Mitch Preston, Regional Sales Manager

Featured Wines:

• Rodney Strong Symmetry Meritage 2019 – 95 pts Decanter, 94 pts Wine Enthusiast (Cellar Selection), 93 pts James Suckling – A Bordeaux-style blend led by Cabernet Sauvignon with layers of black fruit, mocha, spice, and refined tannins.

• Rodney Strong Knights Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2022 – Deeply colored with blackberry, plum, cocoa, and spice framed by rich, velvety tannins.

• Rodney Strong Russian River Valley Pinot Noir 2023 – Bright and juicy with blueberry, pomegranate, oak spice, and a supple, rounded finish.

• Rodney Strong Russian River Valley Chardonnay 2023 – Aromatic with peach, citrus, and pear balanced by a creamy midpalate and soft acidity.

• Rodney Strong Alexander Valley Sauvignon Blanc 2023 – 94 pts Tasting Panel, 92 pts James Suckling – Fresh and complex with lemon, honeysuckle, grapefruit, and a mineral-driven finish.

Explore the depth and elegance of Sonoma winemaking with Rodney Strong—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.
